attributes.additional_details:
Over the last 15/17 or so years we have been promised by all parties an honest and fair approach to government Blair promised a new era but in fact was a attention seeker and bordering on treason Brown and  Cameron both promised us a referendum on Europe and Cameron promised to address and even scrap the Bill of Human Rights' and curb immigration. No party has lived up to their pre election bravado it is now time that it became law that any party not addressing or debating their election promises and manifestos be charged with the offence of breech of promise after their first term of office.

The pollutions of today are liars and cheats only in politics to serve their own interests which has been proven by recent court cases against those not as smart as their fellow comrades in deceit
